entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow or rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
